name: Santa's Little Helper
description:
:

Made in like 4 days for a game jam.  Sadly, I really overestimated my capabilites and the end result is very "meh". I had like 6 hours to do ALL the models and it shows. There's no music and sounds, sadly, which is a tendency for me at this point.

Everything but a one(1) normal map was made by me, including fonts, and in doing so much stuff a realized I never want to touch blender in my life ever again.

I learned a lot, tho, and maybe you want to learn something too, so, I'll leave project's github repo link here

Please consider commenting. Thank you for reading this and playing my game.
